author: queglay
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

Currently I believe ssh in Powershell only supports SSH public key identification, but all the projects I work on use X509 SSH Certificates.

I'd really like to use Powershell more but without this ability its not possible for me to transition towards it, I'd love to see this feature implemented.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_
